Posts.Content: A shock to find out I have more cancer, operation 17th October. I was told that when the breast was looked at before the lump was small and hidden so didn't show. I will probably need only radiotherapy like before, that I should be grateful for. I've being through this before, this time I'm more nervous. Anyone gone through this or similar, any advice gratefully received Thanks Claire
Posts.Title: 2nd breast,cancer

Posts.Content: Julie waited for appointment to set out treatment plan, no letter no phone call. Julie called after I persuaded her she had every right to. They hadn't got her notes! They said they would call back, which that did but only to say they would sort it out next week. Has this happened to anyone else, what did you do? Claire
Posts.Title: treatment plan appointment cancelled

Posts.Content: What a good idea. Julie has found out more, she is very interested in donating her hair, she has it long. I'm glad  she has found something positive to do, she has been quite down about everything. Hug to all Claire
Posts.Title: Hair cut

Posts.Content: Thanks for this post, Julie is interested in donating her hair, she has it long. It's good something positive as she has been down about nearly everything. Hug Claire
Posts.Title: Hair cut

Posts.Content: Hi all Just got back from York. Julie and I had a brilliant time, sights, shops. Well and as for Betteys  delicious. We went on Saturday and  loved it, so much that we went again today before leaving. We both want to go again, if only for Betteys! Thanks for the suggestion Claire
Posts.Title: YAY!!

Posts.Content: I was just told by Julie( my girlfriend) she's booked us a weekend away in York. I'm so happy to have a break. Hugs to all Claire
Posts.Title: YAY!!

Posts.Content: I just got to the hotel here in York with Julie. I can't wait to see around tomorrow. Hug to all Claire
Posts.Title: YAY!!

Posts.Content: I just got to the hotel here in York with Julie. I can't wait to see around tomorrow. Hug to all Claire
Posts.Title: YAY!!

Posts.Content: Managed to sleep 5 hours without waking up. It's not that long but it is for me as I'm finding it hard to sleep. Enjoy your afternoon everyone. Hug to all.
Posts.Title: YAY!!

Posts.Content: Hi all Just got back from York. Julie and I had a brilliant time, sights, shops. Well and as for Betteys  delicious. We went on Saturday and  loved it, so much that we went again today before leaving. We both want to go again, if only for Betteys! Thanks for the suggestion Claire
Posts.Title: YAY!!

Posts.Content: Do you hear what I hear? More like a Carol but I like it very much! Claire
Posts.Title: whats your fave xmas song lovely ladies ?

Posts.Content: My birthday is also March 5th bevb47. Claire
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: That slogan is the great-!
Posts.Title: To all you lovely ladies out there.

Posts.Content: Congratulations, that's really good.
Posts.Title: feeling hopeful

Posts.Content: No crush on male consultant, but on bc nurse yes.  I think this should go on LGBT site! Claire
Posts.Title: Did anyone else develop a teensy consultant crush during their treatment...

Posts.Content: Thanks Helen, I will go to the Gp tomorrow. My family won't ask, but everyone on here helps so much. Understanding, caring, loving- the best family I could ever want. Hug to all Claire
Posts.Title: pain in nipple on breast with new lump

Posts.Content: I now have a lot of pain in the nipple of the breast that has new lump. This is getting to much, I`m waiting for scan to see if the lump just discovered at my follow u p appointment has cancer and now it gives me pain. The pain killers I have aren't helping. Cancer one breast ok, well not really. But now maybe both! Julie gives me support, thank goodness, I'm not going to bother telling my family. Claire
Posts.Title: pain in nipple on breast with new lump

Posts.Content: Hi Sorry to hear your problem, I haven't had that problem just wanted to say hello as you had no answers. I hope you get advice. I just get very tired after radiotherapy. Good luck Claire
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy ,dry throat and cough

Posts.Content: I find I'm missing posts especially first posts so difficult to reply. Anyone else miss posts Claire
Posts.Title: missing posts

Posts.Content: I've being waiting for a special one!
Posts.Title: Missing Avent Calendar

Posts.Content: I've just had third day of radiotherapy, each day I seem to feel more tired. I get home sit down and sleep , more or less 1 hour, 1 1/2 hour. When it's night time I sleep for approximately 4 hours but then awake for the rest of the night. My partner Julie seems to sense I'm awake, she won't sleep if I'm awake. So I don't sleep and I keep Julie awake. I feel bad with everything. Claire Claire,
Posts.Title: always tired

Posts.Content: The booklet is great thanks. I asked Julie if she got enough sleep, she said yes. I am trying to see where I could move to so let her sleep, the difficulty is getting out of bed without disturbing her. What has just got difficult is accepting I can't help with housework and shopping. Now the weekend, rest a lot before more radiotherapy on Monday. Claire
Posts.Title: always tired

Posts.Content: I finished my radiotherapy on Friday I wasn't told anything and forgot to ask I was just so happy I had finished.What should I expect now?
Posts.Title: what happens after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: How to start, I was living with my partner, she's left me. How alone I feel now. No one to talk to, no one to listen to me complain or just talk. I had surgery, radiotherapy, now waiting for follow up appointment . No idea what happens there. I don't have family that understands or wants to understand about my relationship or illness. Where else can I complain or say my feelings.
Posts.Title: alone

Posts.Content: Yes Gill my family knew about my cancer from me. That was a bad experience, involving my so called partner, she was still with me then. I don't want to remember that conversation, situation as it involved my said partner and family. I hate my family at times for the way they treat me or don't treat me. Now it reminds me a lot of when I told them I was a lesbian and had a girl friend who I loved. It didn't go down well We are 5 siblings 4 boys 1 girl-me- In the middle, always being the different one, caused problems Claire
Posts.Title: alone

Posts.Content: Thanks for all the replies, love, support, advice. I have joined the LGBT group helped a lot. Since I posted a cousin contacted me, we meet up and talked, sort of helped. But where is my family, parents, brothers, sisters. I can't believe they don't care. We were close when growing up. Why have they left me alone when I need them. Just because my sexuality is different. Can't they at least support me because I have cancer. I don't understand its not as though I've murdered someone . I'm getting upast thinking is making me cry may be I will post more later Claire
Posts.Title: alone

Posts.Content: I can see from other posts Christmas was good. Unfortunately I was in bed with flu, my partner Julie was and is a great tea fairy or anything I want fairy! Best wishes and hugs to all Claire
Posts.Title: belated Christmas

Posts.Content: I went down with flu, just as I got better, Julie got it. When you live with someone it's so easy to pass it on even if you don't want to. Each looks after the other with love and care so it's bound to happen they get it! I missed coming on here, now back, hopefully. Hug to all Claire
Posts.Title: G n j
